Actions.Name: Delete Appointment ID
Actions.Description: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s).

Actions.Name: Delete AppointmentResponse ID
Actions.Description: A reply to an appointment request for a patient and/or practitioner(s), such as a confirmation or rejection.

Actions.Name: Delete Device ID
Actions.Description: A type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity. The device may be a medical or non-medical device.

Actions.Name: Delete Encounter ID
Actions.Description: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

Actions.Name: DELETE Flag ID
Actions.Description: Prospective warnings of potential issues when providing care to the patient.

Actions.Name: Delete Location ID
Actions.Description: Details and position information for a physical place where services are provided and resources and participants may be stored, found, contained, or accommodated.

Actions.Name: Delete Patient ID
Actions.Description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

Actions.Name: Delete Person ID
Actions.Description: Demographics and administrative information about a person independent of a specific health-related context.

Actions.Name: Delete Practitioner ID
Actions.Description: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.
